body.name: Garmin Dash Cam Mini 2, 1080p, 140-degree FOV, Incident Detection Recording and Signature Series Cloth

asinVariationValues.variationValue: Dash Cam Mini 2 with Constant Power Cable

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 1 hr 33 mins
features: This Bundle Contains: 1 Garmin 010-02504-00 Dash Cam Mini 2, Car Key-Sized Dash Cam, 140-Degree Wide-Angle Lens, Captures 1080P HD Footage, Very Compact with Automatic Incident Detection and Recording + 1 Signature Series Black Camo Extra Soft Microfiber Lens Cloth for Screens, Glasses, Lenses, Scopes, etc

Garmin Dash Cam - Access the camera remotely for Live View monitoring (requires constant power and an active Wi-Fi connection; access via the Garmin Drive app on your compatible smartphone) when you’re away from your parked car.

Garmin Dash Cam - The Parking Guard feature monitors activity around your parked vehicle and alerts if an incident is detected (requires Wi-Fi connection; access via the Garmin Drive app on your compatible smartphone).

Garmin Dash Cam - Voice control (only available in English, German, French, Spanish, Italian and Swedish) lets you use spoken commands to save video, start/stop audio recording, take still pictures and more.

Garmin Dash Cam - Driver alerts such as forward collision, lane departure and speed camera warnings, help encourage safer driving and increase situational awareness (Certain conditions may impair the warning function; Red light and speed camera warnings are not available in all regions)
Garmin Dash Cam - Saved videos are stored securely in the online Vault and can be accessed using the Garmin Drive app on your compatible smartphone.
body.description: Garmin 010-02504-00 Dash Cam Mini 2, Car Key-Sized Dash Cam, 140-Degree Wide-Angle Lens, Captures 1080P HD Footage, Very Compact with Automatic Incident Detection and RecordingGarmin Dash Cam Mini 2 captures high-quality 1080P HD footage in a dash camera about as small as a car key. Once plugged into your vehicle’s power source, The camera continually records and automatically saves video of incidents. Notice: some jurisdictions regulate or prohibit use of this device. It is your responsibility to know and comply with applicable laws and rights to privacy in jurisdictions where you plan to use this Device.Signature Series Black Camo Extra Soft Microfiber Lens Cloth for Screens, Glasses, Lenses, Scopes, etc.Signature Series Microfiber Cleaning Lens Cloth Premium High Quality Soft Microfiber Cleaning Lens Cloth that is safe for all surfaces and designed to pick up dust and dirt without scratching or leaving streaks. Super effective and very safe to use on rifle scopes, spotting scopes, camera lenses, TVs, computer monitors, laptops, tablets, smartphones, eyeglasses, sunglasses or any other delicate surfaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great little camera with good video.
reviews.reviewText: I have the 140 in my truck and love it. It has a screen for viewing.This mini is perfect for my new car for its size and ease of mounting. I have one facing forward and one in the rear.My car is an ioniq 5 limited with 6 built in cameras that you can not download or store video from. So you have to mount dash cameras next to installed cameras. Ugh.Fortunately, this mini is small a d easy to mount in tight places. The front camera is on the passenger side of the rear view mirror mount. The rear camera is just below the rear viewing camera where it is hard to see the camera but has a great view.I had best buy install both cameras. Front camera is being powered from the 12 volt accessory outlet under the dash, centerline next to bluelink port. Not hardwired. Rear camera is powered from 12 volt accessory outlet, driver side back left corner of the boot area. There is a good OBD2 dual usb power plug available from garmin with a selectable power type. Power for 10 minutes after shutdown, 24 hours, or continuous power. I. Ight switch to that but that would mean a long cord for rear viewing.I put in a 256g card for storing video. After 1,500 miles I still haven't filled the card. Make sure you use the garmin recommended card type. Trust me, it makes a difference.My only issue is the constant red light. Thankfully, I can not see the forward one from the drivers seat and the rear viewing one is not in my rear view due to my rear view mirror is actually a video view from the car's rear camera just above my garmin one.Flawless integration with App. If you really need to download video take the card out of the camera and download directly to phone, tablet or computer to save time. Downloading with App takes forever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It was easy yo install and easy to set up. Make sure you get a good memory card. Good quality picture as well, i plug mine into the 12v outlet in the car because it turns off when switch the car off.Only thing that is a pain is the connectivity with bluetooth/wifi it drops out and is a little awkward to connect. So that is why i give it 4 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 12, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic camera, (better than before) Garmin app
reviews.reviewText: Update: Jan 2024They made the app way less glitchy!! It’s still clunky, but now it’s usable. But seriously. When you get the video from the SD card, the quality is FANTASTIC. I got a Micro SD reader that plugs in to my phone. It’s perfect!Original:The camera is amazing. I have one on my front windshield, one on the rear window. They sync together! However… I have to take the Micro SD card out of the cameras to utilize the footage!! This is due to the absolute CRAP app that Garmin has constructed. I can’t get a single thing to load, not even the live view. These cameras still serve my needs and I can still make the settings however I want. I’d say they’re worth it.Also, I like how there’s no screens! No extra light in my cabin to tire out my eyes at night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Perfect size, the voice commands are a nice feature also. I used a dongar adapter to pull power off the rear view mirror and everything works great, if you have a problem connecting your phone to Bluetooth as I did(said it couldn’t be found on the garmin app on my phone but was showing on BT settings) use the included usb adapter and plug the unit into a wall outlet to set it up and it’ll pair, then you can transfer it to your vehicle once paired.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewText: After having this device and the constant power attachment to the OBD2 port for a few months here's a few things about it.• sometimes it doesn't even work.- I have it hooked up to my OBD2 port so I can utilize the park mode when my car isn't on. After about a month of use sometimes the device doesn't even turn on. It's happened to me twice where I almost got into an accident and it wasn't even recording.• It doesn't automatically save to the SD card I have in it.- sometimes things will happen and I want to show people some of the dumb things people do on the road because I spend most of my time driving so I see a lot. By the time I get around to showing people, the video was never saved and had already been written over.• The export time takes forever- the app is VERY buggy which makes it hard to use, device loses wifi connection mid-export and even just to export just a minute of footage it takes 10 minutes. Good luck with anything over a minute.• Gets very hot- like the first generation's overheating issues, this one also gets so hot you can't touch it. Nice window defogger though. At least it can still see when there is dew or snow over the spot because it melts it right away.Some good things about it at least• very small easy to conceal• has an app to access videos and settings (if you can get it to connect)• resolution is good and clear• audio on/off featureOverall, I would not recommend it. Other garmin devices may work better but this is just not it. I wasted my money on this. Save yourself some heartache and go with something else.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the compact size which makes it easy to install and does not hinder or obstruct your view. The camera is of excellent quality with excellent video quality. The cost was affordable and well worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Turns off randomly?
reviews.reviewText: This camera is great, but it does sometimes turn off randomly. Also be aware that it will beep randomly while you're driving to indicate that it is beginning a recording session , but that hasn't bothered me, just something to keep an eye out for. Otherwise great buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Much much better than the last dash cam I had. I love that you can log into it with your phone and watch the footage live. Easy to use. Easy to set up. I bought 2 cords for it so I can just pop it off one car, and when I move to a different vehicle I plug it in and go. Easy. The UV filter helps a lot in Southern California sun. It’s an expensive addition but helps a lot. I might buy a second am for the back window. Garmin will always be a great company for cameras, gps and watches.

Its clever to take out the built-in screen used on other cameras that is not needed most of the time. This saves space and money.The camera is easy to setup and install.Mine didnt come with the cloth as advertised.2 cables are included, one for power and one (shorter) one for data transfer.The very sticky windshield mount is small and 2 are included. The ball socket is tight and gives infinite adjustment. The camera is lightweight and stays in place.The power cable is long with a mini-USB on one end (for camera) and a USB-A on the other. A 12V cigarette lighter adapter is included if you need it, or you can plug it directly into a USB-A port.Because of its size its easy to mount this anywhere. I mounted mine in front of my rearview mirror and I cant see it when im driving. 2 LED lights on the unit indicate status.Downloading the free Garmin App and connecting is simple. You can live view for adjusting and also adjust other settings and view recorded videos and pictures.Image quality is HD and files are a good size, unlike 4K files which are large.Im using the recommended high quality microSD card (Sandisk High Endurance) to ensure fast and reliable recording.Overall a very good dashcam from a trusted brand.
A Garmin é pioneira em produto de qualidade e satisfação sendo assim dificilmente me decepciono.

Es una cámara con un excelente rango de visión, excelente calidad, un material resistente, se adhiere al vidrio, cosa que se ve tremendamente fuerte, al mover la cámara hacia arriba o hacia abajo, es como si fueran pequeños clics, y yo pensé que en cada movimiento brusco o golpeteo de algún bache o algo así, la cámara tendería a moverse, porque no es algo que se ajuste como tal, se ve muy flojo, pero para mi sorpresa, no se mueve para absolutamente nada, quede impresionado con la adherencia y al fijar la lente de la cámara no se mueve por nada con los movimientos del carro.Si me costo trabajo vincularla con la aplicación, puedo compararlo con otras aplicaciones, ya que he tenido varias dashcam, pero si me fue difícil, ya entendiéndole, pues se vuelve sencillo, e incluso hasta ahora no se si se conecta con bluetooth o con el wifi, porque según yo es con los dos, cosa que con otras cámaras únicamente es por medio de wifi, no es algo que afecte, pero si es molesto andar desconectando el bluetooth del carro (quitar la música, lo de llamadas etc) y pasarlo a la cámara, pero fuera de eso, cumple con sus expectativas, aun no he comprobado la calidad de audio, ya que la estoy usando para la parte trasera del carro, ya que considere que es tan importante la parte de frente, como la trasera grabar.Si recomiendo la cámara, me hace falta mucho tener una pequeña pantalla en ella, cosa que en otras he tenido y facilita las cosas al configurar, pero te acostumbras a manejarlo todo al conectarlo al cel. Repito, cumple con su función, calidad-precio, y pues llevo poco tiempo usándola, prácticamente 25 días, pero ha funcionado a la perfección, actualizare algún detalle que pudiera surgir mas adelante, y se los hare saber.
nice dashcam, but did not come with the cloth it said it had.
Tiene que estar siempre conectado a un puerto USB del auto,e que estar siempre conectado a un puerto USB del auto, El producto no se puede devolver.
